DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of pharyngeal residue in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Pharyngeal Residue Following Swallowing
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of the pharyngeal residue remaining after an individual swallows.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Pharyngeal Residue Following Swallowing
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of the pharyngeal residue remaining after an individual swallows.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of the pharyngeal residue remaining after an individual swallows.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of minimal to no pharyngeal clearance following swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Minimal to No Pharyngeal Clearance Following Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of minimal to no pharyngeal clearance following swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of the majority of contrast within or on pharyngeal structures following swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of collection of residue within or on pharyngeal structures following swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of collection of residue within or on pharyngeal structures following swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of trace residue within or on pharyngeal structures following swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of trace residue within or on pharyngeal structures following swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of complete pharyngeal clearance following swallowing.
